definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Capsule valves longitudinally vittate to abaxially vittate with lateral vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向裂片具油道到背面具油道具側小泡。

sentences.english: Inside each lobe there are 3 or 4 short trigger6) hairs.
sentences.chinese: 每個圓裂片內都有3到4根觸發陷阱的短毛。

sentences.english: Comparatively, the frequency of variation on number of tepals was obvious higher than that of stamens.
sentences.chinese: 花被裂片數目變異的頻率明顯高於雄蕊數目變異。

sentences.english: Wash the cucumber, peeled and cut into thin slices to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 將胡瓜洗淨，去皮去心切成裂片。

sentences.english: Calyx campanulate; lobes 5, subequal , as long as tube.
sentences.chinese: 花萼鍾狀裂片5，近等長，倍於筒部。

sentences.english: Calyx lobes 3, wider than long, margin distinctly dentate.
sentences.chinese: 萼裂片3，長不及寬，邊緣明顯具牙齒。

sentences.english: I am using microscope to observe the lobes of the flower.
sentences.chinese: 我利用顯微鏡觀察這朵花的裂片。

sentences.english: Seeds ca. 4 per valve, brown, rugose .
sentences.chinese: 結子約4每裂片，棕色，具皺紋。

sentences.english: Margin of leaf blades and calyx lobes ciliate.
sentences.chinese: 葉片和萼裂片的邊緣具緣毛。

sentences.english: Calyx lobes broadly ovate to suborbicular.
sentences.chinese: 萼裂片寬卵形到近圓形。

sentences.english: The peel is bright red and thin, of which the lobes are even.
sentences.chinese: 果皮鮮紅，皮薄，皮上裂片無峯尖，營養豐富。

sentences.english: Leaves all similar, usually submerged, with filiform segments.
sentences.chinese: 全部相似的葉，通常沉水的，具絲狀的裂片。

sentences.english: Two wing-like lobes4) create the shape of the trap.
sentences.chinese: 兩個翼狀的圓裂片構成陷阱。

sentences.english: Corolla lobes 5, subequal, rounded, tube short.
sentences.chinese: 花冠裂片5，近等長，圓形，筒部短。

definition: axillary (botany)/budding in the angle between branch and stem
